ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.9'

about.description:
Python package to communicate with the IKEA Trådfri (Tradfri)
ZigBee Gateway compatible with ZigBee Light Link products. By
using this library you can communicate with the gateway and
control IKEA's lights and wall plugs.
about.summary: IKEA Trådfri/Tradfri API. Control and observe your lights from Python.

about.description:
Python package to communicate with the IKEA Trådfri (Tradfri)
ZigBee Gateway compatible with ZigBee Light Link products. By
using this library you can communicate with the gateway and
control IKEA's lights and wall plugs.
about.summary: IKEA Trådfri/Tradfri API. Control and observe your lights from Python.

name: pytradfri
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "pytradfri" %}
{% set version = "14.0.0" %}
{% set python_min = "3.10" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/pytradfri-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 05dca2680b6b47e559c8ab321db595805769ffa6b7170a8d1a3bdf1d3442714f

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - pydantic

test:
  imports:
    - pytradfri
    - pytradfri.api
  commands:
    - pip check
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}

about:
  home: https://github.com/home-assistant-libs/pytradfri
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: IKEA Trådfri/Tradfri API. Control and observe your lights from Python.
  description: |
    Python package to communicate with the IKEA Trådfri (Tradfri)
    ZigBee Gateway compatible with ZigBee Light Link products. By
    using this library you can communicate with the gateway and
    control IKEA's lights and wall plugs.
  doc_url: https://github.com/home-assistant-libs/pytradfri
  dev_url: https://github.com/home-assistant-libs/pytradfri

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jan-janssen
